name: Lonely Planet Malaysia, Singapore & Brunei 13th Edition
description: Admire Kuala Lumpur from the glittering Petronas Towers, climb the Telaga Tujuh waterfalls in Langkawi, or glide through the water village of Kampung Ayer, all with this trusted travel guide to Malaysia, Singapore and Brunei. Included are photos, maps and comprehensive planning tools to help you get the most out of your trip.
